Name: BOLT Egyptian Arabic-English Word Alignment -- Conversational Telephone Speech Training
Description: The source data in this release consists of transcripts of Egyptian Arabic conversational telephone speech (CTS) from LDC's CALLHOME and CALLFRIEND collections (LDC97S45, LDC97T19, LDC2002S37, LDC2002T38, LDC96S49) that were translated into English by professional translation agencies and annotated for the word alignment task.
